Text: Offer for VentureWire SubscribersJeffrey One of VentureWires missions is to provide our subscriber base with valuable opportunities to find out more about the people and companies driving the private equity markets As such we have arranged a special offer for you to attend Enterprise Outlook on June and at the San Francisco Airport Marriott Enterprise Outlook will examine the best technologies for collaboration businessprocess management application integration supplychain software and other businesscritical areas And as a VentureWire subscriber you will SAVE an additional of the registration price If you register early by May your savings will be a total of off the full price Learn more at vwasp Management Presentations From licensed software to Webbased services a new crop of startups have geared up to provide the underlying technology needed to cross the corporate boundaries and firewalls that divide manufacturers suppliers distributors and customers Privately held presenting companies include Asera provides software and services for creating Web based applications Datasweep supplies software that helps contract manufacturers and their customers view and adjust activities on the factory floor iMediation helps Global companies reach out to their channel partners Check out the complete line up of up to presenting companies by going to vwasp Speakers The industry strives for the utopian enterprise vision of streamlined connection within and among companies for the direct exchange of data and transactions between people applications machines and businesses At Enterprise Outlook top executives will discuss how the industry moves in that direction Danl Lewin VP NET Business Development Microsoft Dale Skeen Chief Technology Officer Vitria Technology Ivan Koon President ECommerce Integration BEA Systems Gregory Owens Chairman CEO Manugistics For a complete speaker agenda check out vwasp The th Annual Enterprise Outlook at the San Francisco Airport Marriot on June and promises to be one of the most exciting conferences of the year So remember dont miss early registration by May and your chance to SAVE up to just for being a VentureWire subscriber Register online at vwasp Thank you Brian OConnell Publisher VentureWire vwasp PS If you think Enterprise Outlook would be a good opportunity for your company to gain additional exposure then contact Michael Dodd at ext or to inquire about sponsorship availabilities PPS If youd prefer not to receive such messages from us follow this link ecancelSolicitaspe NRONCOM and well make sure you dont in the future
